title: Watch: ABC News Report on How Clinton Fdn Donor Got on Sensitive Intelligence Board
title_page: Watch: ABC News Report on How Clinton Fdn Donor Got on Sensitive Intelligence Board | Breitbart
text:
Friday, ABC News’ Brian Ross reported on Rajiv K. Fernando, a major Clinton Foundation’s donor who had “no known experience in the area,” being appointed to a State Department “sensitive government security advisory board.”
After detailing Hillary Clinton’s staff’s involvement in Fernando appointment, the report shows a video clip of Hillary Clinton during her Secretary of State confirmation hearing vowing that no Clinton Foundation donors would not receive any special treatment.
Follow Pam Key on Twitter @pamkeyNEN
